Name: FlipPanel
Notes: A large panel that can be pressed by stepping on it. It has to be grouped with a FlipPanelObserver in order to activate a switch or to spawn a Power Star. Stepping on it again will revert it into its original state. However, once all grouped panels have been activated, they cannot be pressed again.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_DEAD.Description: Can be activated when the object is killed through a cutscene action.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

Group.Description: The group of panels and their controller. The limit of objects is 32 in SMG1 and 128 in SMG2.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene.
